definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: My elder brother and I loaded the handcart with wheat and pulled it home.
sentences.chinese: 我和哥哥用架子车装了一车麦子拉回家。

sentences.english: The wheat Chai hilt, like a sword ordinary, straight wear kitano musashi throat.
sentences.chinese: 麦子的钗柄如利剑普通，直穿北野武藏的喉咙。

sentences.english: Maizidian Xijie, Sanyuanqiao, Across from Xinhengji Tower on Women's Street.
sentences.chinese: 麦子店西街9号，三元桥，女人街新恒基大厦路口。

sentences.english: The wheat should head out next week if the weather remains sunny.
sentences.chinese: 要是天气继续晴朗，下星期麦子就会结穗。

sentences.english: India is the world's second highest producer of rice and wheat.
sentences.chinese: 印度是世界第二大稻米和麦子的生产国。

sentences.english: Wheat and blade immediately big shout a voice to summon YuFen flapping up.
sentences.chinese: 麦子与刀锋顿时大呼一声扑上去前去召唤玉芬。

sentences.english: When the wheat is headed it is reaped and threshed .
sentences.chinese: 麦子熟了，就把它收割脱粒了。

sentences.english: The sudden storm thwarted the farmers getting in wheat.
sentences.chinese: 突然而来的暴风雨使农民们不能把麦子都收进来。

sentences.english: One day, a colt took a bag of wheat to the mill.
sentences.chinese: 一天，小马驮着麦子去磨坊。

sentences.english: Most of the wheat will be ground into flour.
sentences.chinese: 大多数麦子将磨成面粉。

sentences.english: Whilst your brother sows his wild oats in the South of France with his floozy ?
sentences.chinese: 而你的兄弟在法国南边和他的贱货一起种麦子么？

sentences.english: Thus in deep hours I have seen, over the fields, the ears of wheat tolling in the mouth of the wind.
sentences.chinese: 深夜的阡陌上我看见，麦子的耳朵在风的嘴里低鸣。

sentences.english: We worked there for a week, helping them to get in what.
sentences.chinese: 我们在那儿劳动了一周，帮助他们收麦子。

sentences.english: The wheat will shell after a few days.
sentences.chinese: 麦子已熟透，再过几天就会脱落了。

definition: variant of 包穀|包谷[bao1 gu3]
ear of grain/gerbe (used on coats of arms)
(dialect) maize/corn/also written 苞穀|苞谷[bao1 gu3]
Takahashi (name)/Takahashi city in Okayama prefecture, Japan/Highbridge (name)
